analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HRACrowdfund.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#281-307):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(checkExistence(_beneficiary)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#288)
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#289-305)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundTransfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#290-291)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- previousInvestor (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#292-295)

HRACrowdfund.checkExistence (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#327-334) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(_beneficiary) == 0 && previousInvestor[_beneficiary] == NEW

Reentrancy in HRACrowdfund.sendToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#307-327):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(checkExistence(_to)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#312-313)
	- _tokenAmount = _value * 10 ** uint256(token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#313-316)
	- token.transfer(_to,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#316-324)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- previousInvestor (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#319-320)

HRACrowdfund.provideDividend has external calls inside a loop:
	- _value = ((token.balanceOf(investors[i])).mul(_dividendValue)).div(_supply) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#343-345)

Reentrancy in HRACrowdfund.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#281-307):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(checkExistence(_beneficiary)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#288)
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#289-305)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundTransfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#290-291)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ethRaised (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#295-296)
	- tokenSold (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#296-297)

Reentrancy in HRACrowdfund.checkExistence (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#327-334):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(_beneficiary) == 0 && previousInvestor[_beneficiary] == NEW (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#330-333)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investors (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#333)

Reentrancy in HRACrowdfund.dividendTransfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#350-361):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#352-361)
	- token.changeTotalSupply(_value) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#355-356)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenDistributeInDividend (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#356-358)

Reentrancy in HRACrowdfund.sendToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#307-327):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(checkExistence(_to)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#312-313)
	- _tokenAmount = _value * 10 ** uint256(token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#313-316)
	- token.transfer(_to,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#316-324)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- manualTransferToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x5fc677acf6f93a6ff9bae139ba85aea0a246d24d.sol#320-321)
